alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 9:29PM MDT until May 29 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN OTERO AND CROWLEY COUNTIES... At 928 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sugar City, or 15 miles northwest of La Junta, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford, Ordway, Manzanola, Olney Springs, Sugar City and Crowley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
